title: Leroy Merlin - rêver & réaliser

creator: Leroy Merlin France
descriptionHtml:
Our Mission: Help you dream your home and realize your projects.

Designed for you and with you, the new Leroy Merlin application has been completely redesigned to fulfill this mission and accompany you, everywhere, all the time.
At each stage of your project, your browsing and shopping experience on a smartphone is now simple, practical, and always 100% secure.

With this app, it's where you want, when you want! In your Leroy Merlin stores, at the office, in the metro or at home, Leroy Merlin is always by your side.

IN SEARCH OF INFORMATION AND SOLUTIONS
- Easily access an offer of more than 250,000 products and services: Terrace & Garden, Bathroom, Kitchen, Storage & Dressing, Materials & Carpentry, Tiles, Parquet & flexible flooring, Decoration and Lighting, Painting and Drugstore, Electricity & Home automation , Heating & Plumbing, Hardware & Security, Tools.
- All product information, advice, explanatory videos and opinions from other customers are at your fingertips.

PREPARE YOUR IN-STORE VISIT OR PURCHASE ONLINE
- Find the availability of products in your store.
- Easily build your shopping lists.
- Free pick-up in 2 hours in store or delivered to your home, the choice is yours.

ALL STORE INFORMATION
- Geolocate yourself and consult the opening hours of nearby stores, as well as their detailed information and all their news.

AT THE STORE
- Save time in store and find the location of all your products thanks to the new "Find in store" feature.
- Find all your shopping lists to be sure not to forget anything and to be able to easily discuss with your in-store advisors.
- Scan barcodes or QR codes on the shelves to instantly access all product information and details.

FOLLOW YOUR ORDERS
- Whether it is an in-store order or an online order, follow the progress of all your orders in your personal space.

NEED HELP

Vos commentaires et vos suggestions d’améliorations nous permettent d’améliorer l’application régulièrement. Pour cela, la rubrique « Donner votre avis » dans l’application ou par mail à app.mobile@leroymerlin.fr

title: Leroy Merlin - DIY, decoration, house, garden

creator: Leroy Merlin France
descriptionHtml:
Our Mission: Help you dream your home and realize your projects.

Designed for you and with you, the new Leroy Merlin application has been completely redesigned to fulfill this mission and accompany you, everywhere, all the time.
At each stage of your project, your browsing and shopping experience on a smartphone is now simple, practical, and always 100% secure.

With this app, it's where you want, when you want! In your Leroy Merlin stores, at the office, in the metro or at home, Leroy Merlin is always by your side.

IN SEARCH OF INFORMATION AND SOLUTIONS
- Easily access an offer of more than 250,000 products and services: Terrace & Garden, Bathroom, Kitchen, Storage & Dressing, Materials & Carpentry, Tiles, Parquet & flexible flooring, Decoration and Lighting, Painting and Drugstore, Electricity & Home automation , Heating & Plumbing, Hardware & Security, Tools.
- All product information, advice, explanatory videos and opinions from other customers are at your fingertips.

PREPARE YOUR IN-STORE VISIT OR PURCHASE ONLINE
- Find the availability of products in your store.
- Easily build your shopping lists.
- Free pick-up in 2 hours in store or delivered to your home, the choice is yours.

ALL STORE INFORMATION
- Geolocate yourself and consult the opening hours of nearby stores, as well as their detailed information and all their news.

AT THE STORE
- Save time in store and find the location of all your products thanks to the new "Find in store" feature.
- Find all your shopping lists to be sure not to forget anything and to be able to easily discuss with your in-store advisors.
- Scan barcodes or QR codes on the shelves to instantly access all product information and details.

FOLLOW YOUR ORDERS
- Whether it is an in-store order or an online order, follow the progress of all your orders in your personal space.

NEED HELP
- Easily contact our specialists who are at your disposal 7 days a week from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m.
- Contact our store and internet customer service.

MEMBERS OF THE MAISON LEROY MERLIN CARD?
- Your Digital Home Card is always with you. Very practical, in store, during your checkouts. Present it at the cash desk, via your smartphone, to accumulate your loyalty points and advantages, and then find all your sales receipts.
- Consult, at any time, your points and your loyalty advantages.


This new application is yours!
Continue to send us your opinions, comments and suggestions for improvement that will allow us to evolve your application regularly. For this, a new "Give your opinion" section in the application or an email address: app.mobile@leroymerlin.fr.

We are already working on many new features to even better support you in all your home improvement projects.

All that remains is to wish you excellent browsing, lots of fun and success in all your projects.

Leroy Merlin… and your projects go further!


Also follow Leroy Merlin news on social networks:
https://fr-fr.facebook.com/leroymerlin
https://twitter.com/leroymerlinfr
https://www.pinterest.com/leroymerlinfr/
https://instagram.com/leroymerlin/

At each stage of your project, your browsing and shopping experience on a smartphone is now simple, practical, and always 100% secure.

With this app, it's where you want, when you want! In your Leroy Merlin stores, at the office, in the metro or at home, Leroy Merlin is always by your side.

IN SEARCH OF INFORMATION AND SOLUTIONS
- Easily access an offer of more than 250,000 products and services: Terrace & Garden, Bathroom, Kitchen, Storage & Dressing, Materials & Carpentry, Tiles, Parquet & flexible flooring, Decoration and Lighting, Painting and Drugstore, Electricity & Home automation , Heating & Plumbing, Hardware & Security, Tools.
- All product information, advice, explanatory videos and opinions from other customers are at your fingertips.

PREPARE YOUR IN-STORE VISIT OR PURCHASE ONLINE
- Find the availability of products in your store.
- Easily build your shopping lists.
- Free pick-up in 2 hours in store or delivered to your home, the choice is yours.

ALL STORE INFORMATION
- Geolocate yourself and consult the opening hours of nearby stores, as well as their detailed information and all their news.

AT THE STORE
- Save time in store and find the location of all your products thanks to the new "Find in store" feature.
- Find all your shopping lists to be sure not to forget anything and to be able to easily discuss with your in-store advisors.
- Scan barcodes or QR codes on the shelves to instantly access all product information and details.

FOLLOW YOUR ORDERS
- Whether it is an in-store order or an online order, follow the progress of all your orders in your personal space.

NEED HELP
- Easily contact our specialists who are at your disposal 7 days a week from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m.
- Contact our store and internet customer service.

MEMBERS OF THE MAISON LEROY MERLIN CARD?
- Your Digital Home Card is always with you. Very practical, in store, during your checkouts. Present it at the cash desk, via your smartphone, to accumulate your loyalty points and advantages, and then find all your sales receipts.
- Consult, at any time, your points and your loyalty advantages.


This new application is yours!
Continue to send us your opinions, comments and suggestions for improvement that will allow us to evolve your application regularly. For this, a new "Give your opinion" section in the application or an email address: app.mobile@leroymerlin.fr.

We are already working on many new features to even better support you in all your home improvement projects.

All that remains is to wish you excellent browsing, lots of fun and success in all your projects.

Leroy Merlin… and your projects go further!

title: Leroy Merlin - DIY, decoration, house, garden

creator: Leroy Merlin France
descriptionHtml:
Our Mission: Help you dream your home and realize your projects.

Designed for you and with you, the new Leroy Merlin application has been completely redesigned to fulfill this mission and accompany you, everywhere, all the time.
At each stage of your project, your browsing and shopping experience on a smartphone is now simple, practical, and always 100% secure.

With this app, it's where you want, when you want! In your Leroy Merlin stores, at the office, in the metro or at home, Leroy Merlin is always by your side.

IN SEARCH OF INFORMATION AND SOLUTIONS
- Easily access an offer of more than 250,000 products and services: Terrace & Garden, Bathroom, Kitchen, Storage & Dressing, Materials & Carpentry, Tiles, Parquet & flexible flooring, Decoration and Lighting, Painting and Drugstore, Electricity & Home automation , Heating & Plumbing, Hardware & Security, Tools.
- All product information, advice, explanatory videos and opinions from other customers are at your fingertips.

PREPARE YOUR IN-STORE VISIT OR PURCHASE ONLINE
- Find the availability of products in your store.
- Easily build your shopping lists.
- Free pick-up in 2 hours in store or delivered to your home, the choice is yours.

ALL STORE INFORMATION
- Geolocate yourself and consult the opening hours of nearby stores, as well as their detailed information and all their news.

AT THE STORE
- Save time in store and find the location of all your products thanks to the new "Find in store" feature.
- Find all your shopping lists to be sure not to forget anything and to be able to easily discuss with your in-store advisors.
- Scan barcodes or QR codes on the shelves to instantly access all product information and details.

FOLLOW YOUR ORDERS
- Whether it is an in-store order or an online order, follow the progress of all your orders in your personal space.

NEED HELP
- Easily contact our specialists who are at your disposal 7 days a week from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m.
- Contact our store and internet customer service.

MEMBERS OF THE MAISON LEROY MERLIN CARD?
- Your Digital Home Card is always with you. Very practical, in store, during your checkouts. Present it at the cash desk, via your smartphone, to accumulate your loyalty points and advantages, and then find all your sales receipts.
- Consult, at any time, your points and your loyalty advantages.


This new application is yours!
Continue to send us your opinions, comments and suggestions for improvement that will allow us to evolve your application regularly. For this, a new "Give your opinion" section in the application or an email address: app.mobile@leroymerlin.fr.

We are already working on many new features to even better support you in all your home improvement projects.

All that remains is to wish you excellent browsing, lots of fun and success in all your projects.

Leroy Merlin… and your projects go further!

Our Mission: Help you dream your home and realize your projects.

Designed for you and with you, the new Leroy Merlin application has been completely redesigned to fulfill this mission and accompany you, everywhere, all the time.
At each stage of your project, your browsing and shopping experience on a smartphone is now simple, practical, and always 100% secure.

With this app, it's where you want, when you want! In your Leroy Merlin stores, at the office, in the metro or at home, Leroy Merlin is always by your side.

IN SEARCH OF INFORMATION AND SOLUTIONS
- Easily access an offer of more than 250,000 products and services: Terrace & Garden, Bathroom, Kitchen, Storage & Dressing, Materials & Carpentry, Tiles, Parquet & flexible flooring, Decoration and Lighting, Painting and Drugstore, Electricity & Home automation , Heating & Plumbing, Hardware & Security, Tools.
- All product information, advice, explanatory videos and opinions from other customers are at your fingertips.

PREPARE YOUR IN-STORE VISIT OR PURCHASE ONLINE
- Find the availability of products in your store.
- Easily build your shopping lists.
- Free pick-up in 2 hours in store or delivered to your home, the choice is yours.

ALL STORE INFORMATION
- Geolocate yourself and consult the opening hours of nearby stores, as well as their detailed information and all their news.

AT THE STORE
- Save time in store and find the location of all your products thanks to the new "Find in store" feature.
- Find all your shopping lists to be sure not to forget anything and to be able to easily discuss with your in-store advisors.
- Scan barcodes or QR codes on the shelves to instantly access all product information and details.

FOLLOW YOUR ORDERS
- Whether it is an in-store order or an online order, follow the progress of all your orders in your personal space.

NEED HELP
- Easily contact our specialists who are at your disposal 7 days a week from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m.
- Contact our store and internet customer service.

MEMBERS OF THE MAISON LEROY MERLIN CARD?
- Your Digital Home Card is always with you. Very practical, in store, during your checkouts. Present it at the cash desk, via your smartphone, to accumulate your loyalty points and advantages, and then find all your sales receipts.
- Consult, at any time, your points and your loyalty advantages.


This new application is yours!
Continue to send us your opinions, comments and suggestions for improvement that will allow us to evolve your application regularly. For this, a new "Give your opinion" section in the application or an email address: app.mobile@leroymerlin.fr.

We are already working on many new features to even better support you in all your home improvement projects.

All that remains is to wish you excellent browsing, lots of fun and success in all your projects.

Leroy Merlin… and your projects go further!


Also follow Leroy Merlin news on social networks:
https://fr-fr.facebook.com/leroymerlin
https://twitter.com/leroymerlinfr
https://www.pinterest.com/leroymerlinfr/
https://instagram.com/leroymerlin/
descriptionShort: Save time in-store with the app

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this version, we have fixed bugs and improved the overall performance of the application.

Help us to improve the app directly in the "Give your opinion" section or by email to app.mobile@leroymerlin.fr

descriptionShort: Save time in-store with the app

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this version, you will be able to manage your addresses and find the list of your means of payment in the Customer Account section.
We have also improved the search engine, the purchase funnel and the Rapid'Scan path.
Of course, the bug hunting continued.

Help us to improve the app directly in the ""Give your opinion"" section or by email to app.mobile@leroymerlin.fr

The research has been improved and Rapid'Scan is faster and more pleasant to use. Finally, managing your customer account is facilitated with all the loyalty advantages available in the app.

Help us improve the application directly in the ""Give your opinion"" section or by email to app.mobile@leroymerlin.fr

title: Leroy Merlin - DIY, decoration, house, garden

creator: Leroy Merlin France
descriptionHtml:
Our Mission: Help you dream your home and realize your projects.

Designed for you and with you, the new Leroy Merlin application has been completely redesigned to fulfill this mission and accompany you, everywhere, all the time.
At each stage of your project, your browsing and shopping experience on a smartphone is now simple, practical, and always 100% secure.

With this app, it's where you want, when you want! In your Leroy Merlin stores, at the office, in the metro or at home, Leroy Merlin is always by your side.

IN SEARCH OF INFORMATION AND SOLUTIONS
- Easily access an offer of more than 250,000 products and services: Terrace & Garden, Bathroom, Kitchen, Storage & Dressing, Materials & Carpentry, Tiles, Parquet & flexible flooring, Decoration and Lighting, Painting and Drugstore, Electricity & Home automation , Heating & Plumbing, Hardware & Security, Tools.
- All product information, advice, explanatory videos and opinions from other customers are at your fingertips.

PREPARE YOUR IN-STORE VISIT OR PURCHASE ONLINE
- Find the availability of products in your store.
- Easily build your shopping lists.
- Free pick-up in 2 hours in store or delivered to your home, the choice is yours.

ALL STORE INFORMATION
- Geolocate yourself and consult the opening hours of nearby stores, as well as their detailed information and all their news.

AT THE STORE
- Save time in store and find the location of all your products thanks to the new "Find in store" feature.
- Find all your shopping lists to be sure not to forget anything and to be able to easily discuss with your in-store advisors.
- Scan barcodes or QR codes on the shelves to instantly access all product information and details.

FOLLOW YOUR ORDERS
- Whether it is an in-store order or an online order, follow the progress of all your orders in your personal space.

NEED HELP
- Easily contact our specialists who are at your disposal 7 days a week from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m.
- Contact our store and internet customer service.

MEMBERS OF THE MAISON LEROY MERLIN CARD?
- Your Digital Home Card is always with you. Very practical, in store, during your checkouts. Present it at the cash desk, via your smartphone, to accumulate your loyalty points and advantages, and then find all your sales receipts.
- Consult, at any time, your points and your loyalty advantages.


This new application is yours!
Continue to send us your opinions, comments and suggestions for improvement that will allow us to evolve your application regularly. For this, a new "Give your opinion" section in the application or an email address: app.mobile@leroymerlin.fr.

We are already working on many new features to even better support you in all your home improvement projects.

All that remains is to wish you excellent browsing, lots of fun and success in all your projects.

Leroy Merlin… and your projects go further!


Also follow Leroy Merlin news on social networks:
https://fr-fr.facebook.com/leroymerlin
https://twitter.com/leroymerlinfr
https://www.pinterest.com/leroymerlinfr/
https://instagram.com/leroymerlin/

creator: Leroy Merlin France
descriptionHtml:
Our Mission: Help you dream your home and realize your projects.

Designed for you and with you, the new Leroy Merlin application has been completely redesigned to fulfill this mission and accompany you, everywhere, all the time.
At each stage of your project, your browsing and shopping experience on a smartphone is now simple, practical, and always 100% secure.

With this app, it's where you want, when you want! In your Leroy Merlin stores, at the office, in the metro or at home, Leroy Merlin is always by your side.

IN SEARCH OF INFORMATION AND SOLUTIONS
- Easily access an offer of more than 250,000 products and services: Terrace & Garden, Bathroom, Kitchen, Storage & Dressing, Materials & Carpentry, Tiles, Parquet & flexible flooring, Decoration and Lighting, Painting and Drugstore, Electricity & Home automation , Heating & Plumbing, Hardware & Security, Tools.
- All product information, advice, explanatory videos and opinions from other customers are at your fingertips.

PREPARE YOUR IN-STORE VISIT OR PURCHASE ONLINE
- Find the availability of products in your store.
- Easily build your shopping lists.
- Free pick-up in 2 hours in store or delivered to your home, the choice is yours.

ALL STORE INFORMATION
- Geolocate yourself and consult the opening hours of nearby stores, as well as their detailed information and all their news.

AT THE STORE
- Save time in store and find the location of all your products thanks to the new "Find in store" feature.
- Find all your shopping lists to be sure not to forget anything and to be able to easily discuss with your in-store advisors.
- Scan barcodes or QR codes on the shelves to instantly access all product information and details.

FOLLOW YOUR ORDERS
- Whether it is an in-store order or an online order, follow the progress of all your orders in your personal space.

NEED HELP
- Easily contact our specialists who are at your disposal 7 days a week from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m.
- Contact our store and internet customer service.

- Your Digital Home Card is always with you. Very practical, in store, during your checkouts. Present it at the cash desk, via your smartphone, to accumulate your loyalty points and advantages, and then find all your sales receipts.
- Consult, at any time, your points and your loyalty advantages.


This new application is yours!

title: LEROY MERLIN

creator: Leroy Merlin SA
descriptionHtml:
Our Mission: Help you dream your home and realize your projects.

Designed for you and with you, the new Leroy Merlin application has been completely redesigned to fulfill this mission and accompany you, everywhere, all the time.
At each stage of your project, your browsing and shopping experience on a smartphone is now simple, practical, and always 100% secure.

With this app, it's where you want, when you want! In your Leroy Merlin stores, at the office, in the metro or at home, Leroy Merlin is always by your side.

IN SEARCH OF INFORMATION AND SOLUTIONS
- Easily access an offer of more than 250,000 products and services: Terrace & Garden, Bathroom, Kitchen, Storage & Dressing, Materials & Carpentry, Tiles, Parquet & flexible flooring, Decoration and Lighting, Painting and Drugstore, Electricity & Home automation , Heating & Plumbing, Hardware & Security, Tools.
- All product information, advice, explanatory videos and opinions from other customers are at your fingertips.

PREPARE YOUR IN-STORE VISIT OR PURCHASE ONLINE
- Find the availability of products in your store.
- Easily build your shopping lists.
- Free pick-up in 2 hours in store or delivered to your home, the choice is yours.

ALL STORE INFORMATION
- Geolocate yourself and consult the opening hours of nearby stores, as well as their detailed information and all their news.

AT THE STORE
- Save time in store and find the location of all your products thanks to the new "Find in store" feature.
- Find all your shopping lists to be sure not to forget anything and to be able to easily discuss with your in-store advisors.
- Scan barcodes or QR codes on the shelves to instantly access all product information and details.

FOLLOW YOUR ORDERS
- Whether it is an in-store order or an online order, follow the progress of all your orders in your personal space.

NEED HELP
- Easily contact our specialists who are at your disposal 7 days a week from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m.
- Contact our store and internet customer service.

MEMBERS OF THE MAISON LEROY MERLIN CARD?
- Your Digital Home Card is always with you. Very practical, in store, during your checkouts. Present it at the cash desk, via your smartphone, to accumulate your loyalty points and advantages, and then find all your sales receipts.
- Consult, at any time, your points and your loyalty advantages.


This new application is yours!
Continue to send us your opinions, comments and suggestions for improvement that will allow us to evolve your application regularly. For this, a new "Give your opinion" section in the application or an email address: app.mobile@leroymerlin.fr.

We are already working on many new features to even better support you in all your home improvement projects.

All that remains is to wish you excellent browsing, lots of fun and success in all your projects.

Leroy Merlin… and your projects go further!

- All product information, advice, explanatory videos and opinions from other customers are at your fingertips.

PREPARE YOUR IN-STORE VISIT OR PURCHASE ONLINE
- Find the availability of products in your store.
- Easily build your shopping lists.
- Free pick-up in 2 hours in store or delivered to your home, the choice is yours.

ALL STORE INFORMATION
- Geolocate yourself and consult the opening hours of nearby stores, as well as their detailed information and all their news.

AT THE STORE
- Save time in store and find the location of all your products thanks to the new "Find in store" feature.
- Find all your shopping lists to be sure not to forget anything and to be able to easily discuss with your in-store advisors.
- Scan barcodes or QR codes on the shelves to instantly access all product information and details.

FOLLOW YOUR ORDERS
- Whether it is an in-store order or an online order, follow the progress of all your orders in your personal space.

NEED HELP
- Easily contact our specialists who are at your disposal 7 days a week from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m.
- Contact our store and internet customer service.

MEMBERS OF THE MAISON LEROY MERLIN CARD?
- Your Digital Home Card is always with you. Very practical, in store, during your checkouts. Present it at the cash desk, via your smartphone, to accumulate your loyalty points and advantages, and then find all your sales receipts.
- Consult, at any time, your points and your loyalty advantages.


This new application is yours!
Continue to send us your opinions, comments and suggestions for improvement that will allow us to evolve your application regularly. For this, a new "Give your opinion" section in the application or an email address: app.mobile@leroymerlin.fr.

We are already working on many new features to even better support you in all your home improvement projects.

All that remains is to wish you excellent browsing, lots of fun and success in all your projects.

Leroy Merlin… and your projects go further!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this version, you can directly visualize the possible variants of a product (color, size, ...) in the search results and an animation has been set up to confirm the addition to the cart.

Your receipts have been improved to make it easier for you to read them and to buy a product again.

Finally, the barcode scanner has been modernized for a better handling and an even more fluid access to the details of our products.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In this version, you can directly visualize the possible variants of a product (color, size, ...) in the search results and an animation has been set up to confirm the addition to the cart.

Your receipts have been improved to make it easier for you to read them and to buy a product again.

Finally, the barcode scanner has been modernized for a better handling and an even more fluid access to the details of our products.

title: LEROY MERLIN

creator: Leroy Merlin SA
descriptionHtml:
Our Mission: Help you dream your home and realize your projects.

Designed for you and with you, the new Leroy Merlin application has been completely redesigned to fulfill this mission and accompany you, everywhere, all the time.
At each stage of your project, your browsing and shopping experience on a smartphone is now simple, practical, and always 100% secure.

With this app, it's where you want, when you want! In your Leroy Merlin stores, at the office, in the metro or at home, Leroy Merlin is always by your side.

IN SEARCH OF INFORMATION AND SOLUTIONS
- Easily access an offer of more than 250,000 products and services: Terrace & Garden, Bathroom, Kitchen, Storage & Dressing, Materials & Carpentry, Tiles, Parquet & flexible flooring, Decoration and Lighting, Painting and Drugstore, Electricity & Home automation , Heating & Plumbing, Hardware & Security, Tools.
- All product information, advice, explanatory videos and opinions from other customers are at your fingertips.

PREPARE YOUR IN-STORE VISIT OR PURCHASE ONLINE
- Find the availability of products in your store.
- Easily build your shopping lists.
- Free pick-up in 2 hours in store or delivered to your home, the choice is yours.

ALL STORE INFORMATION
- Geolocate yourself and consult the opening hours of nearby stores, as well as their detailed information and all their news.

AT THE STORE
- Save time in store and find the location of all your products thanks to the new "Find in store" feature.
- Find all your shopping lists to be sure not to forget anything and to be able to easily discuss with your in-store advisors.
- Scan barcodes or QR codes on the shelves to instantly access all product information and details.

FOLLOW YOUR ORDERS
- Whether it is an in-store order or an online order, follow the progress of all your orders in your personal space.

NEED HELP
- Easily contact our specialists who are at your disposal 7 days a week from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m.
- Contact our store and internet customer service.

MEMBERS OF THE MAISON LEROY MERLIN CARD?
- Your Digital Home Card is always with you. Very practical, in store, during your checkouts. Present it at the cash desk, via your smartphone, to accumulate your loyalty points and advantages, and then find all your sales receipts.
- Consult, at any time, your points and your loyalty advantages.


This new application is yours!
Continue to send us your opinions, comments and suggestions for improvement that will allow us to evolve your application regularly. For this, a new "Give your opinion" section in the application or an email address: app.mobile@leroymerlin.fr.

We are already working on many new features to even better support you in all your home improvement projects.

creator: Leroy Merlin SA
descriptionHtml:
Our Mission: Help you dream your home and realize your projects.

Designed for you and with you, the new Leroy Merlin application has been completely redesigned to fulfill this mission and accompany you, everywhere, all the time.
At each stage of your project, your browsing and shopping experience on a smartphone is now simple, practical, and always 100% secure.

With this app, it's where you want, when you want! In your Leroy Merlin stores, at the office, in the metro or at home, Leroy Merlin is always by your side.

IN SEARCH OF INFORMATION AND SOLUTIONS
- Easily access an offer of more than 250,000 products and services: Terrace & Garden, Bathroom, Kitchen, Storage & Dressing, Materials & Carpentry, Tiles, Parquet & flexible flooring, Decoration and Lighting, Painting and Drugstore, Electricity & Home automation , Heating & Plumbing, Hardware & Security, Tools.
- All product information, advice, explanatory videos and opinions from other customers are at your fingertips.

PREPARE YOUR IN-STORE VISIT OR PURCHASE ONLINE
- Find the availability of products in your store.
- Easily build your shopping lists.
- Free pick-up in 2 hours in store or delivered to your home, the choice is yours.

ALL STORE INFORMATION
- Geolocate yourself and consult the opening hours of nearby stores, as well as their detailed information and all their news.

AT THE STORE
- Save time in store and find the location of all your products thanks to the new "Find in store" feature.
- Find all your shopping lists to be sure not to forget anything and to be able to easily discuss with your in-store advisors.
- Scan barcodes or QR codes on the shelves to instantly access all product information and details.

FOLLOW YOUR ORDERS
- Whether it is an in-store order or an online order, follow the progress of all your orders in your personal space.

NEED HELP
- Easily contact our specialists who are at your disposal 7 days a week from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m.
- Contact our store and internet customer service.

MEMBERS OF THE MAISON LEROY MERLIN CARD?
- Your Digital Home Card is always with you. Very practical, in store, during your checkouts. Present it at the cash desk, via your smartphone, to accumulate your loyalty points and advantages, and then find all your sales receipts.
- Consult, at any time, your points and your loyalty advantages.


This new application is yours!
Continue to send us your opinions, comments and suggestions for improvement that will allow us to evolve your application regularly. For this, a new "Give your opinion" section in the application or an email address: app.mobile@leroymerlin.fr.

We are already working on many new features to even better support you in all your home improvement projects.

All that remains is to wish you excellent browsing, lots of fun and success in all your projects.

Leroy Merlin… and your projects go further!
